const Header = () => {

      <div className="header-right">

          )}

        <div className="user-profile" onClick={toggleDropdown}>

          />
          {/* <img alt="User Avatar" className="avatar" /> */}

              <div className="dropdown-item">Settings</div>
              <div className="dropdown-item">Logout</div>

    </div>
  );
};
